item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:4, topic:538035”][quote author=robonick8 link=topic=656859.msg4394739#msg4394739 date=1388776687]

You should use bootstrap. It is perfect for websites of this nature, plus you won’t have to deal with the stupid positioning bullshit.

I will start to use Bootstrap but for now I just want to know if there is a fudgin fix for this :eek:
[/quote]Yeah, Bootstrap is the fix.[/quote]
So your saying I should restart whole template and use bootstrap?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

[center][size=12pt]I have tried to fix by messing around with margins and height and width values but still nothing. When you first load the website it looks like this[/size]

[size=12pt]But if you refresh it in goes to the correct position which I dont understand why :palm:[/size]

[size=12pt]Help would be very appreciated and also I appologize if I am spamming this forum section with constant help[/size][/center]

HTML Part (Its not the whole html file I just put where it is messed up at but if needed to post whole thing just ask!)

[code]


Jailbreak IOS 7

Jailbreak IOS 7 How To Jailbreak
IMPORTANT NOTES: Mosy Cydia Tweaks will not work because they are not yet compatiable with IOS 7 or the ARM64. Developers are working hard so be pataient! Also Apple is soon to be releasing a new revision of IOS 7 and its has been said that the Jailbreak works best off a clean restored 7.0.4! Apple will stop signing the 7.0.4 revision so you must hurry and update/restore to 7.0.4 and Jailbreak!
[/code]

CSS File

[code]body {
font-family: Cursive;
}
h1 {
font-family: Helvetica Neue;
font-size: 45px;
}
footer {
display: inline-block;
background-image: url(img/footer.png);
background-repeat: x;
padding-right: 15px;
padding-left: 15px;
margin-right: auto;
margin-left: auto;
}
.container2 h1 {
text-align:center;
}
#menu {
width: 100%;
height: 35px;
font-size: 16px;
font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;
font-weight: bold;
text-align: center;
text-shadow: 3px 2px 3px #333333;
background-color: #000000;
border-radius: 5px;
}
#menu ul {
height: auto;
padding: 8px 0px;
margin: 0px;
}
#menu li {
display: inline;
padding: 10px;
}
#menu a {
text-decoration: none;
color: white;
padding: 8px 8px 8px 8px;
}
#menu a:hover {
color: white;
background-color: #3684EB;
}
#header {
background-image: url(“img/background.png”);
height: 500px;
width: auto;
text-align: left;
}
#header h1 {
margin-bottom: 35px;
}

.sub_header {
float: right;
text-align: center;
font-family: Cursive;
margin-right: 175px;
position: relative;
}

.btn1 {
background-color: #5b331d;
color: white;
width: auto;
height: auto;
-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
-moz-border-radius: 3px;
padding: 14px 26px;
text-decoration: none;
font-family: Cooper;
cursor: pointer;
margin-left: 30px;
margin-bottom: -20px;
text-shadow: 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
font-weight: bold;
transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-webkit-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-moz-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-ms-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-o-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
text-shadow: 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}
.btn-price {
background-color: #1BAEC4;
color: white;
width: 20px;
height: 30px;
-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
-moz-border-radius: 3px;
padding: 14px 26px;
text-decoration: none;
font-family: Helvetica Neue;
cursor: pointer;
margin-right: 30px;
margin-bottom: -20px;
text-shadow: 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
font-weight: bold;
transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-webkit-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-moz-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-ms-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-o-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
text-shadow: 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}
.btn1:active {
padding-top: 15px;
margin-bottom: -1px;
}
.btn1:hover {
background-color: #B35300;
color: #fff;
outline: 0 none;
text-decoration: none;
}
.btn-price:active {
padding-bottom: 15px;
margin-bottom: -1px;
}
.btn-price:hover {
background-color: #07D1F0;
outline: 0 none;
text-decoration: none;
color: white;
}
#rows {
display: inline-block;
width: auto;
height: 250px;
text-align: center;
margin-bottom: 150px;
margin-top: -50px;
}
#row {
display: inline-block;
width: 1100px;
height: auto;
text-align: center;
}

.box_1 {
text-align: center;
float: left;
width: 300px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 40px;
border: none;
}
.box_2 {
text-align: center;
float: right;
width: 300px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 40px;
border: none;
}
.box_3 {
text-align: center;
float: right;
width: 300px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 40px;
border: none;
}
.col_1 {
text-align: center;
float: left;
width: 450px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 50px;
}
.col_2 {
text-align: center;
float: right;
width: 450px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 50px;
}
.col_3 {
text-align: center;
float: left;
width: 450px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 50px;
margin-top: 40px;
}
.col_4 {
text-align: center;
float: right;
width: 450px;
padding: 10px;
margin: 50px;
margin-top: 40px;
}
#ex4 {
width: 300px; margin: 0 auto;
-webkit-transition: all 0.5s ease-out;
-moz-transition: all 0.5s ease;
-o-transition: all 0.5s ease;
}
#ex4:hover {
-webkit-transform: rotate(-7deg);
-moz-transform: rotate(-7deg);
-o-transform: rotate(-7deg);
opacity: .5;
}
#ex3 {
opacity: 1;
transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out;
-moz-transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out;
-webkit-transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out;
}
#ex3:hover {
opacity: 0.5;
}
#ex2 {
opacity: 1;
-webkit-transform: scale(1,1);
-webkit-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
-webkit-transition-duration: 250ms;
-moz-transform: scale(1,1);
-moz-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
-moz-transition-duration: 250ms;
}
#ex2:hover {
opacity: .7;
-webkit-transform: scale(1.05,1.07);
-webkit-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
-webkit-transition-duration: 250ms;
-moz-transform: scale(1.05,1.07);
-moz-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
-moz-transition-duration: 250ms;
position: relative;
z-index: 99;
}
#fadein {
-webkit-animation: fadein 2s; /* Safari and Chrome /
-moz-animation: fadein 2s; / Firefox /
-ms-animation: fadein 2s; / Internet Explorer /
-o-animation: fadein 2s; / Opera */
animation: fadein 2s;
}

@keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Firefox */
@-moz-keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Safari and Chrome */
@-webkit-keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Internet Explorer */
@-ms-keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}?

/* Opera */
@-o-keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}?
.cydia {
float: left;
margin-left: 25px;
font-family: Helvetica Neue;
}
#downloads {
text-align: center;
margin-top: 35px;
}
#downloads h2 {
font-size: 45px;
font-family: Helvetica Neue;
margin-bottom: 20px;
}
#downloads a {
margin-top: 30px;
margin-left: 15px;
}
#downloads p {
margin-top: 30px;
font-family: Cursive;
}
.install {
-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 1px 0px 0px #0ebff5;
-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 1px 0px 0px #0ebff5;
box-shadow:inset 0px 1px 0px 0px #0ebff5;
background-color:#57c0e6;
-webkit-border-top-left-radius:7px;
-moz-border-radius-topleft:7px;
border-top-left-radius:7px;
-webkit-border-top-right-radius:7px;
-moz-border-radius-topright:7px;
border-top-right-radius:7px;
-webkit-border-bottom-right-radius:7px;
-moz-border-radius-bottomright:7px;
border-bottom-right-radius:7px;
-webkit-border-bottom-left-radius:7px;
-moz-border-radius-bottomleft:7px;
border-bottom-left-radius:7px;
text-indent:0px;
border:1px solid #0a0f01;
display:inline-block;
color:#ffffff;
font-family:Verdana;
font-size:15px;
font-weight:bold;
font-style:normal;
height:40px;
line-height:40px;
width:125px;
text-decoration:none;
text-align:center;
text-shadow:1px 1px 0px #0d1402;
}.install:hover {
background-color:#00a4fc;
text-decoration: none;
color: white;
}.install:active {
position:relative;
top:1px;
}
#copyright {
text-align: center;
text-decoration: bold;
}
#clear {
clear: both;
}[/code]
